seo.title: Tire Base – AI Business Directory Portal | Codersh
seo.description: An AI-integrated business directory platform for the US tire and rubber recycling industry. Built to connect recyclers, manufacturers, and buyers in real time.
seo.keywords: AI directory, tire recycling, business listings, geo-location search, B2B portal

title: Tire Base – AI Integrated Business Directory Portal for the Recycle Tire & Rubber Industry
projectname: Tire Base – Scrap Tire & Rubber Users Portal
overview: A comprehensive business portal for the scrap tire and rubber recycling industry. It allows users to discover, connect, and manage listings with AI-driven insights and real-time data visualization.

features.heading: Business Listings
features.text: with company details, email/phone, and geo-location.

features.heading: AI-Powered Matching
features.text: suggests relevant businesses, buyers, and recyclers based on category and location.

features.heading: Dynamic Search & Filters
features.text: helps users refine searches by materials, states, or service types.

features.heading: Interactive Map Integration
features.text: visualizes all businesses on Google Maps with clustering and detail popups.

features.heading: User Dashboard
features.text: for managing profiles, business listings, and lead inquiries.

techStack.heading: AI & Geo Features
techStack.text: OpenAI API, Google Maps API, LocationIQ
